instruction: 统计Error关键字的数量与昨天相比
output: starttime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 查询Error关键字数量比较今天和昨天
output: starttime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 统计Error日志量最近三天的同比趋势
output: starttime="now/d" Error | bucket timestamp span=1h as ts | stats count() by ts | eval hour=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" Error | bucket timestamp span=1h as ts | stats count() by ts |eval hour=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="昨天" ]] | append [[ starttime="now-2d/d" endtime="now-1d/d" Error | bucket timestamp span=1h as ts | stats count() by ts |eval hour=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="前天" ]]

instruction: 请输出spl查询语句，对应用的错误数进行今天与昨天的对比,
output: starttime="now/d" appname:application error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" appname:application Error | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 比较日志趋势
output: starttime="now/d" * | bucket timestamp span=1h as ts | stats count() by ts | eval hour=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" * | bucket timestamp span=1h as ts | stats count() by ts |eval hour=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 今天与昨天的mysql应用错误数对比
output: starttime="now/d" appname:mysql error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" appname:mysql error | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 今天与昨天的ss应用错误数对比
output: starttime="now/d" appname:ss error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" appname:ss error | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]

output: appname:SPL | timechart span=1h count() | timewrap 1h

instruction: 错误数环比,将过去一段时间内的错误数与当前时间比较,并绘制一个趋势图。
output: error | timechart rendertype="line" span=1h count() | timewrap 1h

instruction: 错误日志时间对比
output: starttime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 环比上一时段呢？
history: starttime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]
output: Error | timechart span=1h count() | timewrap 1h

instruction: 错误对比今天与昨天

instruction: 今天与昨天的错误数对比
output: starttime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 今天与明天的错误数对比。
output:
下面 SPL 语句可以实现查询今天和明天的错误日志数量并进行对比。但是请注意：正常情况下，日志是记录已经发生的 IT 系统事件，不应该出现在明天。
starttime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now+1d/d" endtime="now+2d/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="明天" ]]

output: starttime="now/d" Error | bucket timestamp span=1h as ts | stats count() by ts | eval hour=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" Error | bucket timestamp span=1h as ts | stats count() by ts |eval hour=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="昨天" ]] | append [[ starttime="now-2d/d" endtime="now-1d/d" Error | bucket timestamp span=1h as ts | stats count() by ts |eval hour=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="前天" ]]

output: starttime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 搜索appname等于test123的占比
output: * | stats count() as total, count(eval(appname=="test123")) as test123 | eval p=test123/total

instruction: 搜索今天appname等于test123的占比,
history: * | stats count() as total, count(eval(appname=="test123")) as test123 | eval p=test123/total
output: starttime="now/d" * | stats count() as total, count(eval(appname=="test123")) as test123 | eval p=test123/total

instruction: 同比昨天
history: * | stats count() as total, count(eval(appname=="test123")) as test123 | eval p=test123/total
starttime="now/d" * | stats count() as total, count(eval(appname=="test123")) as test123 | eval p=test123/total
output: starttime="now/d" * | stats count() as total, count(eval(appname=="test123")) as test123 | eval p=test123/total | eval line="今天" | append [[starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" * | stats count() as total, count(eval(appname=="test123")) as test123 | eval p=test123/total | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 查询所有索引中_index:* Error关键字的数量，并将今天和昨天做同比。
output: starttime="now/d" _index:* Error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" _index:* Error | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 对比今天与明天的错误数
output:
下面 SPL 语句可以实现对比今天与明天的错误数。但请注意：正常情况下，日志是记录已经发生的 IT 系统事件，不应该出现在明天。
starttime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now+1d/d" endtime="now+2d/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="明天" ]]

instruction: 请对比今天和昨天的数据量
output: starttime="now/d" * | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" * | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 今天和昨天错误日志的对比,
output: starttime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" Error | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 今天、昨天、一周前netscreen防火墙网络监控数据趋势对比
output: starttime="now/d" endtime="now" appname:firewall tag:netscreen | bucket timestamp span=1h as ts|stats count() as count_ by ts| eval hour=formatdate(ts,"HH")|eval line="今天"|append [[starttime="-1d/d" endtime="now/d" appname:firewall tag:netscreen | bucket timestamp span=1h as ts|stats count() as count_ by ts| eval hour=formatdate(ts,"HH")|eval line="昨天"]] | append [[starttime="-7d/d" endtime="-6d/d" appname:firewall tag:netscreen | bucket timestamp span=1h as ts|stats count() as count_ by ts| eval hour=formatdate(ts,"HH")|eval line="一周前"]]

instruction: 统计今天日志量和昨天的对比。
output: starttime="now/d" * | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" * | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 查询昨天和今天日志量趋势的同比
output: starttime="now/d" * | bucket timestamp span=1h as ts | stats count() by ts | eval hour=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm    ") | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" * | bucket timestamp span=1h as ts | stats count() by ts |eval hour=formatdate(ts, "    HH:mm") | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 最近一小时总流量趋势和昨天同时段的对比。
output: starttime="now-1h" * | bucket timestamp span=1m as ts | stats count() by ts | eval hour=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm:ss") | eval line="最近一小时" | append [[ starttime="now-1d-1h" endtime="now-1d" * | bucket timestamp span=1m as ts | stats count() by ts |eval hour=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm:ss") | eval line="昨天同一时段" ]]

instruction: 和昨天同一时段的日志数量进行同比
output:
假设你查询最近半小时日志数量的昨日同比，可使用如下语句：
starttime="now-30m" * | stats count() | eval line="最近半小时" | append [[ starttime="now-30m-1d" endtime="now-1d" * | stats count() | eval line="昨天同一时段" ]]

instruction: 今天和昨天相比，网络失败事件次数的变化,
output: starttime="now/d" appname:network error | stats count() | eval line="今天" | append [[ starttime="now-1d/d" endtime="now/d" appname:network error | stats count() | eval line="昨天" ]]

instruction: 查询最近十分钟SPL应用日志数量趋势，环比分析
output: starttime="now-10m" appname:SPL | bucket timestamp span=1m as ts | stats count() by ts |  eval minute=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="最近十分钟" | append [[starttime="now-20m" endtime="now-10m" appname:SPL | bucket timestamp span=1m as ts | stats count() by ts |  eval minute=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="环比前十分钟" ]]

instruction: 追加一个子查询，内容是同比分析，昨天相同的这10分钟内，来自SPL应用的日志数量
history: 查询最近十分钟SPL应用日志数量趋势，环比分析,

starttime="now-10m" appname:SPL | bucket timestamp span=1m as ts | stats count() by ts |  eval minute=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="最近十分钟" | append [[starttime="now-20m" endtime="now-10m" appname:SPL | bucket timestamp span=1m as ts | stats count() by ts |  eval minute=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="环比前十分钟" ]]
output: starttime="now-10m" appname:SPL | bucket timestamp span=1m as ts | stats count() by ts |  eval minute=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="最近十分钟" | append [[starttime="now-20m" endtime="now-10m" appname:SPL | bucket timestamp span=1m as ts | stats count() by ts |  eval minute=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="环比前十分钟" ]] | append [[ starttime="now-10m-1d" endtime="now-1d" appname:SPL | bucket timestamp span=1m as ts | stats count() by ts | eval minute=formatdate(ts, "HH:mm") | eval line="同比昨天" ]]
